Body:
record = GraphicRecord(sequence_length=50, features=[GraphicFeature(start=5,
    end=20, strand=+1, label='a'), GraphicFeature(start=20, end=500, strand
    =+1, label='b'), GraphicFeature(start=400, end=700, strand=-1, label='c')])
biopython_record = record.to_biopython_record(sequence=50 * 'A')
features = sorted([(f.location.start, f.location.end, f.qualifiers['label']
    ) for f in biopython_record.features])
assert features == [(5, 20, 'a'), (20, 500, 'b'), (400, 700, 'c')]
